meanings.sent1: The unmelodious song made my ears hurt.
meanings.sent2: The unmelodious music was difficult to listen to.
meanings.sent3: The unmelodious tune sounded like a cat trying to sing.
meanings.sent4: The unmelodious notes clashed like cymbals in a silent room.
meanings.sent5: Her unmelodious voice echoed through the empty hallways.

meanings.sent1: The unmelodious screech of the brakes startled me.
meanings.sent2: The unmelodious noise of the construction site was deafening.
meanings.sent3: The unmelodious honking of the geese made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: The unmelodious clash of opinions filled the room with tension.
meanings.sent5: The unmelodious sound of the alarm clock jolted me awake.
